questionText.text: A flowchart is a visual representation of the sequence of the steps and decisions needed to perform a process
Which symbol is used to start a flowchart
Which symbol is used for Decision making in a flowchart

activity_json.title: A flowchart is a visual representation of the sequence of the steps and decisions needed to perform a process
This activity helps you to understand how to design a basic flowchart using Assignment or Process symbol

questionText.text: This Assignment helps you to understand how to design a basic flowchart using Selection symbol and Assignment or Process symbol. Deliverable Format: Complete this problem on a piece of paper and take a picture and upload it in the Google drive folder named computational thinking  you created yesterday under Day-2. Follow the naming format as Assignment-1. Deadline :  This task should be completed by the end of 9PM. If any extension of deadline is required contact your mentor. Score : A total of 5 marks will be awarded for this problem if all the steps represented in the respective symbols of those statements. Give a number, check whether it is positive number or negative number?
